value.text: Request for Status/Salary Change or Department Transfer

event.name: event__layout_ready
event.script: this.rawValue = xfa.layout.page(this)

event.name: event__layout_ready
event.script: this.rawValue = xfa.layout.pageCount()

body.p: Use this form to process a change in the following :

ul.li: Continuation of Contract (if not paid on the normal ECM cycle of July-June)
Salary Change (if only salary is changing)
Status/Assignment Change - if employee’s main assignment is changing

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: var payarea = xfa.record.I0001_ABKRS_NEW.DATA[0].FIELD.value //use old payroll area if new payroll area does not exist if ( Len(payarea) > 0 & payarea <> data.Data_Page.CurrPosInfo.LeftSide.Payroll.PayrollTxt.rawValue ) then $.rawValue = "Proposed action results in payroll area change" else $.rawValue = "" endif

event.name: event__initialize

body.p: To process a change for the employee check the corresponding action box below and then complete the remaining information sections on the form. If you have any questions please contact Human Resources.

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access //$record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "APPROVE" | if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "RECEIVING_MANAGER" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then this.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__exit
event.script: var warning = "" var today_lt90 = Date() - 90 var today_gt90 = Date() + 90 var startdt = Date2Num($.formattedValue,"MMM D, YYYY") if ( startdt < today_lt90 ) then warning = "Date is 90 or more days earlier than today's date. Continuing with this date may cause retroactive accounting problems." endif if ( startdt > today_gt90 ) then warning = "Date is 90 or more days greater than today's date. Continuing with this date may cause retroactive accounting problems." endif if (HasValue(warning)) then xfa.host.messageBox(warning) endif

value.text: Is employee transferring to another org unit?

event.name: event__click
event.script: data.Data_Page.DeptTransfer_SF.presence = "hidden" data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.Reason.rawValue = "" data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.CheckBoxes.POSITION_CB.rawValue = "0" data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.presence = "visible" data.CostOverride.presence = "visible" data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.NewPosition_SF.NewPosition.rawValue = data.Data_Page.CurrPosInfo.LeftSide.Position.PositionKey.rawValue

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: if($record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "SENDING_MANAGER" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "PROCESS" ) then if ($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true") then $.access = "readOnly" else $.access = "" endif else $.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__form_ready
event__click
event.script:
if($record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "SENDING_MANAGER" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "PROCESS" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW <> "true") then $.access = "" else $.access = "readOnly" endif
data.Data_Page.DeptTransfer_SF.presence = "visible"; data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.Reason.rawValue = "03" data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.CheckBoxes.POSITION_CB.rawValue = "1" data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.presence = "hidden" data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.NewPosition_SF.NewPosition.rawValue = ""

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: if($record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "RECEIVING_MANAGER") then this.access = "readOnly" endif

value.text: Enter the system user name of the manager of the new org unit to which the employee is to be transferred. The request will be forwarded to the new manager.

event.name: event__exit
event__preOpen
event__form_ready
event__layout_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "RECEIVING_MANAGER") then this.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__click
event__form_ready
event.script: //Toggle visibility to be visible during edit operations, ínvisible otherwise if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "APPROVE" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then this.presence = "invisible" else this.presence = "visible" endif if($record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "RECEIVING_MANAGER") then this.presence = "hidden" endif

event.name: event__enter
event.script: //Set ISR_EVENT for BAdI processing in backend $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_EVENT = "USER_EVENT_CHECK"

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: if (data.Data_Page.TrasnferQuest_SF.OrgUnit_RadioButton.ISR_RadioButton[1].rawValue == "Y") then $.presence = "visible" else $.presence = "hidden" endif

body.p: Complete the remaining information sections on the form. If you have any questions please contact Human Resources. Please also work with the former manager when necessary.

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if ($record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "SENDING_MANAGER" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW == "ISR_PROCESS" ) then if ($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW <> "true") then $.access = "" else $.access = "readOnly" endif else $.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "APPROVE" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then this.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "APPROVE" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then this.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "APPROVE" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then this.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__click
event__form_ready
event.script:
//Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "APPROVE" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then $.access = "readOnly" else $.access = "" endif
if (data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.CheckBoxes.CONTINUE_CB.rawValue == "1") then if ( data.Data_Page.CurrPosInfo.LeftSide.EmpGrp.EmpGrpValue.rawValue <> "F" ) then $.presence = "visible" else $.presence = "hidden" endif else $.presence = "hidden" endif

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script:
//Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "APPROVE" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then $.access = "readOnly" else $.access = "" endif
if (data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.CheckBoxes.CONTINUE_CB.rawValue == "1") then if ( data.Data_Page.CurrPosInfo.LeftSide.EmpGrp.EmpGrpValue.rawValue == "F" ) then $.presence = "visible" else $.presence = "hidden" endif else $.presence = "hidden" endif

event.name: event__exit
event__preOpen
event__form_ready
event__layout_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if ($record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "SENDING_MANAGER" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW == "ISR_PROCESS" ) then if ($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW <> "true") then $.access = "" else $.access = "readOnly" endif else $.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if ( $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW == "ISR_REQUEST" ) then if ($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW <> "true") then $.access = "" else $.access = "readOnly" endif else $.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__change
event.script: ISR_TextNoLabel.rawValue = ""; $record.I0001_ABKRS_NEW.DATA[0].FIELD.value = "";

event.name: event__click
event__form_ready
event.script: //Toggle visibility to be visible during edit operations, ínvisible otherwise if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "APPROVE" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then this.presence = "hidden" else this.presence = "visible" endif

event.name: event__enter
event.script: //Set ISR_EVENT for BAdI processing in backend $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_EVENT = "USER_EVENT_CHECK"

event.name: event__exit
event__preOpen
event__form_ready
event__layout_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" ) then this.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "APPROVE" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then $.access = "readOnly" else $.access = "" endif

event.name: event__exit

message.text: Weekly Hours must be between 1 and 40

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" ) then this.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" ) then this.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__form_ready

message.text: Hourly Rate must be 5.00 or more

event.name: event__exit
event.script: $record.I0008_BETRG.DATA[0].FIELD.value = $.rawValue data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.Salary.AnnualRate.rawValue = $record.I0008_DIVGV.DATA[0].FIELD.value * 26 * $.rawValue data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.Salary.AnnualRate.rawValue = Round( data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.WorkScheduleSF.WeeklyHours.rawValue * data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.Salary.HourlyRate.rawValue * 52,2)

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script:
//get new payroll area var payarea = xfa.record.I0001_ABKRS_NEW.DATA[0].FIELD.value //use old payroll area if new payroll area does not exist if ( Len(payarea) == 0 ) then payarea = data.Data_Page.CurrPosInfo.LeftSide.Payroll.PayrollTxt.rawValue endif
if (payarea == "B2") then this.presence = "hidden" // this.borderColor = "192,192,192" else this.presence = "visible" //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "APPROVE" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then this.access = "readOnly" else this.access = "open" endif endif

message.text: Annual Salary must be grater than 100.00

event.name: event__exit
event.script: $record.I0008_BETRG.DATA[0].FIELD.value = $.rawValue / 12 $record.R3_SALARY.DATA[0].FIELD.value = $.rawValue $record.R3_EMPCT.DATA[0].FIELD.value = data.Data_Page.NewMgrInstr_SF.WorkScheduleSF.FTE.rawValue

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "APPROVE" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then this.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__exit
event__preOpen
event__form_ready
event__layout_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "APPROVE" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then this.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: //Check ISR control parameters for read/write access if($record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_MODE == "DISPLAY" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW =="ISR_APPROVE" | $record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "APPROVE" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then this.access = "readOnly" endif

event.name: event__form_ready
event.script: if ($record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "SENDING_MANAGER") then if(data.Data_Page.TrasnferQuest_SF.OrgUnit_RadioButton.rawValue == "Y") then this.presence = "hidden" else this.presence = "visible" endif elseif ($record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "RECEIVING_MANAGER") then if(data.Data_Page.TrasnferQuest_SF.OrgUnit_RadioButton.rawValue == "Y") then this.presence = "visible" else this.presence = "hidden" endif else this.presence = "visible" endif

value.text: Do you need to create a cost override outside of your default cost center?

event.name: event__click
event.script: //hide cost override table and make it readonly data.CostOverride.sfCostOverrideLines.access = "readOnly" data.CostOverride.sfCostOverrideLines.presence = "hidden" //clear cost override table data.CostOverride.sfCostOverrideLines.sf_COD_DATES.dCostOvr_begda.rawValue = "" data.CostOverride.sfCostOverrideLines.sf_COD_DATES.dCostOvr_endda.rawValue = "" for i=0 upto 4 step 1 do data.CostOverride.sfCostOverrideLines.Table1.Row1[i].Cell1[0].rawValue = "" data.CostOverride.sfCostOverrideLines.Table1.Row1[i].Cell2[0].rawValue = "" data.CostOverride.sfCostOverrideLines.Table1.Row1[i].Cell3[0].rawValue = "" data.CostOverride.sfCostOverrideLines.Table1.Row1[i].Cell4[0].rawValue = "" data.CostOverride.sfCostOverrideLines.Table1.Row1[i].Cell5[0].rawValue = "" data.CostOverride.sfCostOverrideLines.Table1.Row1[i].Cell6[0].rawValue = "" data.CostOverride.sfCostOverrideLines.Table1.Row1[i].Cell7[0].rawValue = "" data.CostOverride.sfCostOverrideLines.Table1.Row1[i].Cell8[0].rawValue = "" data.CostOverride.sfCostOverrideLines.Table1.Row1[i].Cell9[0].rawValue = "" endfor

event.name: event__click
event__form_ready
event.script: if ( Len(Ltrim($record.COST_OVERRIDE_TEXT.DATA[0].FIELD)) > 0 ) then //hide question cost override exists $.presence = "hidden" else $.presence = "visible" if ( $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then $.access = "readOnly" else if ( $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW == "ISR_REQUEST" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW == "ISR_PROCESS" ) then $.access = "open" else $.access = "readOnly" endif endif endif

value.text: What would you like to do with the existing cost override?

event.name: event__click
event__click

value.text: New Cost Override, other than default cost center

event.name: event__click
event__form_ready
event.script: if ( Len(Ltrim($record.COST_OVERRIDE_TEXT.DATA[0].FIELD)) > 0 ) then //show question if cost override exists $.presence = "visible" if ( $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then $.access = "readOnly" else if ( $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW == "ISR_REQUEST" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW == "ISR_PROCESS" ) then $.access = "open" else $.access = "readOnly" endif endif else $.presence = "hidden" endif

event.name: event__click
event__form_ready
event.script: //Toggle visibility to be visible during edit operations, ínvisible otherwise if ( $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_REVIEW == "true" ) then $.presence = "hidden" else if ( $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW == "ISR_REQUEST" | $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_FORM_VIEW == "ISR_PROCESS" ) then $.presence = "visible" else $.presence = "hidden" endif endif

event.name: event__enter
event.script: //Set ISR_EVENT for BAdI processing in backend $record.CONTROL_PARAM.ISR_EVENT = "USER_EVENT_CHECK"

event.name: event__form_ready
event__form_ready
event.script: if ($record.FORM_SCENARIO_STAGE.DATA.FIELD == "SENDING_MANAGER") then if(data.Data_Page.TrasnferQuest_SF.OrgUnit_RadioButton.rawValue == "Y") then this.presence = "hidden" else this.presence = "visible" endif endif

event.name: event__form_ready
event__form_ready
event__exit
event.script: $record.IT0000_INFO_TEXT.DATA[0].FIELD.value = concat( data.Comments_Prev.rawValue, $.rawValue ) $record.COMMENT_LEN.DATA[0].FIELD.value = Len(Ltrim(Rtrim($.rawValue))) + Len(Ltrim(Rtrim(data.Comments_Prev.rawValue)))

event.name: event__preSave
event__form_ready
event__layout_ready
